java.lang.Object

public class MigratorValiditionUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Contains utility methods used to validate a Migrator.

Caleb Powell , David Harcombe

findDeprecatedNodesInProcessDefinition

public static java.lang.String[] findDeprecatedNodesInProcessDefinition(org.jbpm.graph.def.ProcessDefinition processDefinition,
                                                                        Migrator migrator)
Searches the processDefinition instance for any deprecated nodes specified in the migrator.

Parameters:
processDefinition -
migrator -
Returns:
An array of deprecated nodes contained in the processDefinition. An empty array if none are found.

findMissingCurrentNodesInTheProcessDefinition

public static java.lang.String[] findMissingCurrentNodesInTheProcessDefinition(org.jbpm.graph.def.ProcessDefinition processDefinition,
                                                                               Migrator migrator)
Searches the processDefinition instance for missing current nodes.

Parameters:
processDefinition -
migrator -
Returns:
An array of current nodes that are specified in the migrator and are missing in the processDefinition. An empty array if no nodes are missing.

findNode

public static org.jbpm.graph.def.Node findNode(org.jbpm.graph.def.ProcessDefinition processDefinition,
                                               java.lang.String nodeName)
Searches the processDefinition instance for a node by name.

Parameters:
processDefinition -
nodeName -
Returns:
the node, or null if no node of that name exists

findCurrentNodesThatAreInvalidWaitStates

public static java.lang.String[] findCurrentNodesThatAreInvalidWaitStates(org.jbpm.graph.def.ProcessDefinition processDefinition,
                                                                          Migrator migrator)
Searches the processDefinition instance for current nodes (as specified in the migrator) that are not supported wait states. See the Migrator's SUPPORTED_WAIT_STATE_NODE_TYPES constant for the set of supported wait state nodes.

Parameters:
processDefinition -
migrator -
Returns:
An array of current node names that are specified in the migrator as current nodes, but are not supported by the migrator.
